nodes.label: Draw reversible and irreversible changes (ice melting vs. egg cooking)
Blue, jagged piece of ice with puddle labeled 'revesible'
Brown egg and cooked egg with heat lines labeled 'irreversible'
Student recognizes reversibility of ice melting and refreezing
Label 'revesible' is misspelled but shows understanding
Ice can melt to water and freeze back to ice
Student attempts to show change with heat but lacks full comprehension
Egg cooking is irreversible, but needs further explanation
Encourage use of arrows for cause-effect understanding
